fr.ign.cogit.cartagen.continuous.leastsquares

Class LeastSquaresMorphing

  • Object
    • NonLinearLeastSquares
      • LeastSquaresMorphing
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContinuousGeneralisationMethod

    public class LeastSquaresMorphing
extends NonLinearLeastSquares
implements ContinuousGeneralisationMethod
    Implementation of the continuous generalisation method from Peng et al. (2013, ICA Generalisation Workshop). It is a line morphing optimised by a Least Squares adjustment. The equations are not linear, so an iterative least squares adjustment is used. The initial step to match line vertices uses the optcor matching process.
    Author:
    GTouya
